verses.text: \w For|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* choirmaster. \w With|strong="H1732"\w* \w stringed|strong="H5058"\w* \w instruments|strong="H5058"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* Maskil \w of|strong="H4905"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. Listen \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* prayer, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* do \w not|strong="H1732"\w* ignore \w my|strong="H1732"\w* plea.
Attend \w to|strong="H8605"\w* me \w and|strong="H8605"\w* answer me. I am restless \w in|strong="H8467"\w* \w my|strong="H5956"\w* complaint, \w and|strong="H8605"\w* distraught

at \w the|strong="H6030"\w* voice \w of|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* enemy, at \w the|strong="H6030"\w* pressure \w of|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* wicked. \w For|strong="H6030"\w* they bring down disaster upon \w me|strong="H6030"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* resent \w me|strong="H6030"\w* \w in|strong="H6030"\w* their anger.

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* heart pounds \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* terrors \w of|strong="H6963"\w* death assail \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Fear|strong="H2342"\w* \w and|strong="H3820"\w* trembling grip \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* horror \w has|strong="H3820"\w* \w overwhelmed|strong="H5307"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.
I said, “Oh, that I had wings like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dove! I would fly away \w and|strong="H3374"\w* find rest.

\w How|strong="H4310"\w* far \w away|strong="H5774"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* flee! \w In|strong="H7931"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* wilderness \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w remain|strong="H7931"\w*. Selah
\w I|strong="H2009"\w* would hurry \w to|strong="H4057"\w* \w my|strong="H7368"\w* shelter, \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H7368"\w* \w this|strong="H3885"\w* raging tempest.”
\w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord, confuse \w and|strong="H7307"\w* confound their speech, for I see violence \w and|strong="H7307"\w* strife \w in|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H7307"\w* city.
Day \w and|strong="H5892"\w* night \w they|strong="H3588"\w* encircle \w the|strong="H7200"\w* walls, \w while|strong="H3588"\w* malice \w and|strong="H5892"\w* trouble lie within.
\w Destruction|strong="H7130"\w* \w is|strong="H7130"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w*; oppression \w and|strong="H3119"\w* deceit never leave \w the|strong="H5921"\w* streets.

\w For|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H7130"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* an enemy \w who|strong="H3808"\w* insults \w me|strong="H3808"\w*; \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* could endure. \w It|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H7130"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* foe \w who|strong="H3808"\w* rises against \w me|strong="H3808"\w*; \w from|strong="H4185"\w* \w him|strong="H7130"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* could hide.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5375"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* myself, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* companion \w and|strong="H1431"\w* \w close|strong="H5641"\w* friend.

We shared sweet fellowship together; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* walked \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* crowd \w into|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* house \w of|strong="H3045"\w* God.

\w Let|strong="H1980"\w* death seize \w them|strong="H3162"\w* \w by|strong="H1980"\w* surprise; \w let|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H3162"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w down|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* Sheol alive, \w for|strong="H1004"\w* evil \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H3162"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w their|strong="H1980"\w* \w homes|strong="H1004"\w*.
\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* call \w to|strong="H3381"\w* God, \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* saves \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

Morning, noon, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* night, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* out \w in|strong="H3068"\w* distress, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* hears \w my|strong="H3068"\w* voice.

\w He|strong="H1242"\w* redeems \w my|strong="H8085"\w* soul \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w peace|strong="H6963"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* battle waged \w against|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*, \w even|strong="H6153"\w* though many oppose \w me|strong="H6963"\w*.

God \w will|strong="H1961"\w* hear \w and|strong="H7965"\w* humiliate \w them|strong="H1961"\w*—\w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w One|strong="H1961"\w* enthroned \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ages—Selah \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* do \w not|strong="H1961"\w* change \w and|strong="H7965"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H1961"\w* fear \w of|strong="H5315"\w* God.
\w My|strong="H8085"\w* companion attacks \w his|strong="H8085"\w* friends; \w he|strong="H3808"\w* violates \w his|strong="H8085"\w* covenant.

\w His|strong="H7971"\w* speech \w is|strong="H3027"\w* smooth \w as|strong="H3027"\w* butter, but war \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* heart. \w His|strong="H7971"\w* words \w are|strong="H3027"\w* softer than oil, \w yet|strong="H7971"\w* \w they|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* swords unsheathed.

Cast \w your|strong="H1697"\w* burden \w upon|strong="H8081"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w He|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* sustain \w you|strong="H6310"\w*; \w He|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* never let \w the|strong="H1697"\w* righteous \w be|strong="H1697"\w* shaken.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w You|strong="H5414"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w down|strong="H7993"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Pit \w of|strong="H3068"\w* destruction; \w men|strong="H6662"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* bloodshed \w and|strong="H3068"\w* deceit \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* live \w out|strong="H7993"\w* half \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H5769"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* trust \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H5414"\w*.
